content.text:
I'm ready to help you with the SPLICE project. I can see this is a comprehensive video editing enhancement platform with AI-powered music generation, consisting of multiple components including a backend API, Adobe plugins, and a Next.js frontend.

Current production status shows:
- Backend deployed to Railway at `https://splice-api-production.up.railway.app`
- PostgreSQL and Redis are running
- Most services configured (SendGrid, Cloudflare R2, OpenAI, Replicate)
- Stripe is in TEST mode (needs switching to live for production)

I notice there are many modified files and untracked documentation files in your git status. 

What would you like to work on? I can help with:
- Committing your current changes
- Debugging or testing features
- Deployment tasks
- Code review or refactoring
- Documentation updates
- Or anything else related to the SPLICE project
